message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $170. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $90?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. While $90 is a bit too low for me, I could be persuaded to go down to $140. It's a steal for this product!
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $110. Can you consider that?
